alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Delaware (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 2:58PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Buchanan and northwestern Delaware Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 257 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Hazleton , or 7 miles south of Oelwein, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Stanley around 305 PM CDT. Aurora around 315 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Lamont, Dundee and Edgewood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
